---
title: "Commodity prices"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(fsp)
a <- system.file("extdata", "unctad-example.csv.7z", package = "fsp")
unctad <- get_unctad(a)
metadata <- get_unctad_metadata(a)

commodities <- c("100600.01", "151110.01", "020100.01", "100100.01", "170100.01")

unctad |> 
  dplyr::filter(commodity %in% commodities, date >= "2007-01-01") |> 
  dplyr::group_by(commodity) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(index = prices/dplyr::lag(prices)) |> 
  ggplot2::ggplot() +
  ggplot2::geom_line(ggplot2::aes(x = date, y = prices)) +
  ggplot2::facet_wrap(ggplot2::vars(commodity_label),scales = "free")
```
